name: RxWiki
overview:
RxWiki is a consumer health website featuring the latest information, news, and video content on a wide range of prescription and over-the-counter medications, vitamins, and natural products.

Online consumers are looking for the most up-to-date information about medications, without the difficult to understand medical speak and jargon that often accompanies drug information today.

Our mission at RxWiki is to fill that gap by empowering you with well-written, pharmacist-approved original content, as well as news and drug information from across the web that is timely, relevant and easy-to-understand, so you can better manage your health.

RxWiki seeks to enhance pharmacy’s ability to partner with their patients on medication therapy management (MTM) services with the goal of increasing medication adherence. Medication non-adherence – or the failure to comply with a prescribed prescription medication regimen – is a $290 billion healthcare challenge due to increased hospitalizations, emergency rooms visits, and additional doctors’ appointments. Pharmacies are the face of neighborhood healthcare – is committed to improving patient’s qualify of life and reducing healthcare costs through increasing medication adherence.
